alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Nelson; Spencer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:52AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spencer, northeastern Nelson, southwestern Anderson and northwestern Washington Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 452 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bardstown, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Spencer, northwestern Washington, northeastern Nelson and southwestern Anderson Counties, including the following locations... Wakefield, Wayside, Samuels Field Airport, Anderson City, Botland, Glensboro, Withrow, Johnsonville, Balltown and Ashbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
